name: rottentomatoes_bulk_search
description: Search multiple titles on Rotten Tomatoes in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling rottentomatoes_search multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass all queries as a single comma-separated string.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Comma-separated search queries (e.g. 'The Matrix,Breaking Bad,The Godfather')

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('search-page-media-row, [class*="search-result"], [data-qa="search-result"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 5); i++) { const el = items[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('a[data-qa="info-name"], [class*="title"] a, a[slot="title"]'); const yearEl = el.querySelector('[data-qa="info-year"], span[slot="year"]'); const tomatometerEl = el.querySelector('rt-text[slot="criticsScore"], [data-qa="tomatometer"]'); const audienceEl = el.querySelector('rt-text[slot="audienceScore"], [data-qa="audience-score"]'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[data-qa="info-name"], a[href*="/m/"], a[href*="/tv/"]'); results.push({ title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', year: yearEl ? yearEl.textContent.trim() : '', tomatometer: tomatometerEl ? tomatometerEl.textContent.trim() : '', audience_score: audienceEl ? audienceEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: linkEl ? (linkEl.href.startsWith('http') ? linkEl.href : 'https://www.rottentomatoes.com' + linkEl.getAttribute('href')) : '' }); } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('search') || '', result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
